recent.name: SignalPath
recent.description: In collaboration with their in-house designer, I redesigned and overhauled their existing Hugo site. A substantial code reduction was achieved. The site was also made more accessible and responsive while maintaining support for IE 11.

recent.name: Vitamin D
recent.description: The main focus for Insight was to have an interactive section where visitors cloud point out which area of their body was hurting and get a description of their symptoms. Using their existing jQuery stack, I create a library-free and responsive app.

recent.name: Internet Exposure
recent.description: This was my first time working with Rails. I collaborated with their designers and developers to create a responsive front-end for the marketing side and the admin/client console.

recent.name: Rustled Jimmies
recent.description: This is one of my favorite projects. It's a comic site that required some creative thinking for the navigation. Done purely with Hugo and HTML, the navigation links are generated automatically on build without the need of any plugins.
